oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Buildings Along 2nd Avenue North, c.1970s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of warehouse buildings along 2nd Avenue North in downtown Nashville, circa 1970s. Noted for their architectural value, many of the buildings are listed on the National Register of Historic Places. Photographed by the Metropolitan Development and Housing Agency. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Housing Authority (Nashville, Tenn.);
